resources.string:
Press button PRACTICE.

 -Learn where the notes are located on the violin fingerboard.

 -Listen and get to know the sound of notes or chords.

 -Try to play melodies!


 Press button PLAY GAME.

 -Test and improve your skills in determining the musical pitch.

 -The game consists of 12 levels which increases in difficulty

-Press the play-button and a random tone will sound.

 -Test your skills in determining the pitch by pressing the corresponding tone on the violin fingerboard.

 -Compare the two sounds! Release the tone and get the result of your skills.

 -Move to next level by collecting points, 10 points for each level.

 -A minor loss of points will occur when failing to determine the musical pitch.

 -The game consists of 12 levels and they increases in difficulty.

 -Touch the icon in the toolbar and switch between music notes and letters.

 Good luck!

-Play tones or chords on the violin fingerboard.

 -Control the length of sound by pressing and releasing individual tones.

 -Play chords using multiple fingers!

 -Try to play melodies!

 -Touch the icon in the toolbar and switch between music notes and letters.
You have reached the end of the game!

There is no ad-free version. The app will close!

 Please uninstall Musical Pitch Game Violin if you want to use an ad-free version!

 Open app again and make another choice if you want to use the app!
